trans-unit.source: Provides a context-enabled binding for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding"></xref> binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpContextBinding"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpContextBinding"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpContextBinding"></xref> class with the specified binding configuration.
The `configName` parameter should be set to the name of the `<binding>` element in the configuration file that configures this binding.
The name of the binding configuration.
Gets a value that specifies whether context management is enabled.
`true` if context management is enabled; otherwise, `false`.
Creates an ordered collection of binding elements that are contained in the current binding.

The collection contains the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextBindingElement> that enables SOAP headers to be used to exchange context when HTTP cookies are not enabled; otherwise use HTTP cookies to exchange context.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection"></xref> that contains the ordered stack of binding elements described by the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpContextBinding"></xref>.
